Job title: Business Analyst
Location: King of Prussia, PA (Day 1 onsite)
Only…
data.text:
Join Our Team as a #TechnicalBusinessAnalyst (9+ Years Experience)! Are you #passionate about bridging the #gap between #technology and #business? Do you thrive in dynamic environments where you can make a real impact? If so, we want you on our team! #Key Responsibilities: #BusinessAnalysis: Lead business analysis activities for multiple projects, ensuring effective requirement gathering, analysis, and documentation. #Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business needs and develop solutions that meet customer requirements. #BRDDevelopment: Develop and maintain consistent BRD (Business Requirement Document) templates across all projects. #RequirementAnalysis: Conduct requirement analysis using tools like JIRA, SDLC, SQL, and API Integration. #ProjectManagement: Manage project timelines and resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality deliverables. #TechnicalSpecificationDevelopment: Translate business requirements into detailed technical specifications that guide the development of software applications, systems, or processes. #DevelopmentAlignment: Work closely with development teams to ensure solutions align with business goals. #DataAnalysis: Perform data analysis to support decision-making and strategy development. #ProcessImprovement: Identify and implement opportunities for process improvements and innovation. #ProjectSupport: Assist in project management tasks, including planning, scheduling, and tracking progress to meet deadlines and budget constraints. #Testing and Quality Assurance: Participate in the testing of developed solutions to ensure they meet defined requirements and standards. Assist in identifying and documenting bugs or issues for resolution. #Training and Support: Develop training materials and provide support to users on new systems or applications, ensuring end-users are equipped to use the new solutions effectively. #Documentation: Create and maintain documentation related to business requirements, technical specifications, project plans, and reports to ensure knowledge is captured and shared. Send your resume to hr@beesolvertechnology.com #Hiring #BusinessAnalyst #TechJobs #JoinOurTeam #CareerOpportunity

Hello Connections, We are looking for a Business Analyst to work with one of our clients in Portland, OR. This is a contract position with an initial assignment duration of 6+ months, with the possibility for assignment extension Job title: Business Analyst Location: Portland, OR Experience: 8 Years No C2C Responsibilities Takes responsibility for investigative work to determine business requirements and specify effective business processes, through improvements in information systems, information management, practices, procedures, and organization change. Applies and monitors the use of modelling and analysis tools, methods and standards, giving special consideration to business perspectives. Collaborates with stakeholders at all levels, in the conduct of investigations for strategy studies, business requirements specifications and feasibility studies. Prepares business cases which define potential benefits, options for achieving these benefits through development of new or changed processes, and associated business risks. Facilitates scoping and business priority setting for large or complex changes, engaging senior stakeholders as required. Selects the most appropriate means of representing business requirements in the context of a specific change initiative. Requirements Requires a bachelor’s degree in business, computer science, engineering, management or other related field or equivalent experience. Certification Requirements (Any Preferences): Certified Business Analysis Professional (CBAP) certification preferred. Preferred 8+ of experience in or knowledge of specific line of business and/or IT environment Requirements gathering background with IT integrations and IT application implementations. Someone proficient in conflict management and prioritization of requirements High proficiency with Microsoft Products. And the ability to create data visualizations and communicate highly technical processes to business professionals. Intermediate knowledge of the International Institute of Business Analysis - BABOK processes. Adaptability in a team environment. Creativity and critical thinking. Please send resumes to sobha@sbsnw.biz if you are interested. #QuickBase #PrimaveraP6 #OracleERP #Coupa #Maximo #MicrosoftOffice #WinEst #DevonWay #ProjectManagement #ERP #BusinessIntelligence #DataAnalysis #DatabaseManagement #ProcessModeling #BusinessSoftware #TechTools#BusinessAnalyst #DataAnalysis #RequirementsGathering #ProcessImprovement #BusinessIntelligence #ProjectManagement #SDLC #Agile #BusinessProcessModeling #BI #DataVisualization #CriticalThinking #StakeholderManagement #TechnicalWriting #ProblemSolving #SQL #Excel #PowerBI #Tableau #DataManagement #Collaboration #BusinessStrategy #TechSkills #AnalyticalSkills

Hello Professionals, Immediate job opening for Business Analyst Business Analyst Fort Worth - TX - 76155 (3 days Hybrid model working) Duration: 12 Months In-person Interview: Yes Job Description: • 2+ years of experience • Understanding of business systems and industry requirements, and knowledge of systems analysis, architecture concepts • Ability to plan strategically for current and future business requirements, to create flexible, scalable solutions. • Experience managing user stories within an Agile software development process. • Ability to work closely with developers and quality assurance teams to define use case diagrams. • Work closely with product owners, stakeholders, and application team to help bridge the gap and elicit requirements. • Translate conceptual requirements into concise functional requirements and testable User Stories that developers can work from • Participate in QA as well as work with stakeholder closely and guide them to ensure UAT is performed. • Perform/assist with multiple aspects involved in the development lifecycle – design, testing, deployments, and prod support. • Provide support and collaborate within a team environment as well as work independently. • Be a part of a DevOps team that completely owns and supports their product. Interested please share with me your updated resume kalyanr@princetonamerica.com #BusinessAnalysis #DataDrivenDecisions #BAInsights #AnalyticsInBusiness #RequirementsGathering #ProcessImprovement #StrategicAnalysis #BusinessIntelligence #DataAnalysis #ROIAnalysis #BusinessStrategy #ProjectManagement #StakeholderEngagement #DecisionSupport #AgileBA #RequirementsManagement #ITBusinessAnalysis #DataVisualization #BIReporting #AnalyticalSkills #BusinessMetrics #DataQuality #ProblemSolving #UserStories #BusinessProcessModeling #SystemsAnalysis #BusinessRequirements #DataMining #PredictiveAnalytics #AgileRequirements #BusinessValue #StrategicPlanning #CriticalThinking #ROIAnalysis #BusinessOptimization #UserExperienceAnalysis #BusinessMetrics #ChangeManagement #ProcessMapping #BusinessSystems #DigitalTransformation #CustomerAnalysis #BusinessAnalyticsTools #CommunicationSkills #ITStrategy #DataIntegration #MarketAnalysis` #DecisionSupportSystem Prajakta Kulkarni Shraddha M Naveen Kumar Princeton America

#Hiring.. #Contract #C2C Share your resume on payal@v2innovationsinc.com Position: Business Analyst – Core Banking Location: Remote - but need only NYC/NJ Candidate Job Type: Contract #C2C Only Duration: 6+ Months Experience: 10+yrs Job Description: • Working with key Business Stakeholders & internal departments like Front Office, Operations, Compliance & IT teams to conduct requirement analysis • Facilitating and leading result-oriented project meetings with optimum efficiency • Defining & Documenting Current & Target state system flows, interface field mapping, data lineage and ETL specifications as per Bank’s SDLC standards • Documenting meeting minutes and tracking all open action items to ensure on-time milestone delivery without lot of oversight by PM • Identifying opportunities for process improvement and automation within banking operations • Conducting data analysis and providing insights to support decision-making and strategic initiatives • Providing ongoing support and troubleshooting for existing systems and processes • Working with UAT Coordinator and participants to UAT Test cases and execution Qualifications • A strong understanding of commercial baking products, services and processes • 10+ years in banking and financial services, with a focus on commercial banking products, services and processes • 10+ years working as a Business Analyst in banking or related fields • Proficiency in data analysis tools such as SQL, Excel and data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI • Writing specifications to build reports • Familiarity with banking systems and technologies, including Core banking system, ACH/Wire payment processing, risk management, and compliance #BusinessAnalyst #BankingIndustry #FinancialServices #RequirementsAnalysis #ProjectManagement #SDLC #ProcessImprovement #Automation #DataAnalysis #DecisionSupport #UAT #CommunicationSkills #TechnicalWriting #CommercialBanking #BankingOperations #SQL #Financial #ACH #Risk

Only Local profiles needed, Seattle, WA Job Role: Business Analyst (Retail must) Duration: Contract (12 months) Location: Seattle, WA- Onsite Local profiles needed, Seattle, WA Job Summary: As an International Business Analyst (INTL BA), you will play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between business objectives and technical implementation within the international domain. You will be responsible for understanding and documenting requirements, refining user stories, managing ticket development, facilitating collaboration with third-party teams, driving process improvement initiatives, reviewing test plans, providing operational support, and contributing to quarterly planning activities. Your analytical skills, communication abilities, and attention to detail will be essential in ensuring the successful delivery of projects and initiatives within the international business landscape. Key Responsibilities: Requirements Management: · Understand all requirements associated with new EPICs or initiatives. · Collaborate with Product Managers/Owners and Senior Developers/Leads to document requirements. · Develop and maintain functional specifications or "How to Use This Feature” documentation. · Lead requirements gathering sessions. Ticket Development & Refinement: · Create and refine detailed User Stories consistent with high-level requirements. · Elicit and document ticket dependencies, ensuring accurate tagging and capture in Dependency Huddle board. · Ensure all stories meet the agreed "Definition of Ready” before sprint planning. · Contribute to work estimates and maintain a healthy backlog. Partnering with Third Party Teams: · Facilitate necessary conversations with internal/external teams. · Conduct meetings with third parties to ensure work progress aligns with timelines. · Foster cross-team collaboration and resolve blockers to keep work progressing. Process Improvement: · Drive continual process improvement focus across the team. · Ensure consistency with international common practices. · Lead Process Improvement activities and share lessons learned with peer Business Analysts. Test Plan Review: · Review test plans to ensure clarity of acceptance criteria and linkage to requirements. Operations Support: · Maintain up-to-date third-party information related to maintenance windows and contact/issue resolution details. Quarterly Planning: · Analyse Business and Technical EPIC requirements to determine solution and stakeholder requirements. · Communicate findings to Product Managers and support the creation of user stories. · Provide details of analysis to support accurate estimation by QA and Engineering teams. · Clarify and confirm assumptions with stakeholders and support Scrum Master in creation of intake requests for external teams. Regards arun.k@gagstek.com

Hi Team, Please find BA role and share some suitable profiles to vinaykumar@itechstack.com Position: Senior Business Analyst Location: Boston, MA (Day-one Onsite) Job Type: Contract Job Description: Business Requirements Management and Solution Development. Experience in writing and understanding of SQL query. Develop and maintain an understanding of the processes, goals, requirements and issues related to Bright Horizons' operational lines of business and supporting systems including how each is used and how the systems integrate to meet business needs. Identify opportunities to accomplish project goals in the most efficient and cost effective manner. Collaborate with business stakeholders to fully understand, define and document business requirements for software and/or process changes through a variety of means focusing on medium to high complexity projects, processes and functional areas of the applications. Conduct user interviews, surveys, workflow reviews and research on industry best practices and user workshops documenting current (As-Is) and Future (To-Be) scenarios including processes, models, use cases, plans, flow diagrams, requirements write ups and solutions. Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs. Extensive understanding experience on data governance and data initiatives and define Data Retention strategy and objectives while enabling business values. Drive and challenge business users on their assumptions of how they will successfully execute their plans. Proactively identify ways in which system and process changes can improve efficiency of key users, customer service, accuracy of results, and/or completeness of data. Act as a change agent to help ensure that assumptions, development and implementation of new systems/processes enhance the success of the project and increase the project's alignment with the business needs. Serve as a liaison between business stakeholders and technical teams to ensure that requirements are properly translated into technical specifications, clarify requirements, review recommendations and answer questions. Collaborate and build consensus between technical team and stakeholders working to balance scope, speed to market and available resources. Ensure that all processes and documentation are consistent with best practices and Bright Horizons standards for Solution Delivery Life Cycle. Drive the development of a master test plan with the QE team with that traces business requirements throughout the SDLC and ensures that all process steps are followed. Primary Skills Business Requirements Management and Solution Development Secondary Skill SQL, Data Governance #c2c #hotlist #vendorlist #hotlist #businessanalyst
